original_title: 35000 Watts: The Story of College Radio
overview: Charting the wild journey of visionaries and rebels who changed the course of music history and made an indelible imprint on our culture. 35000 Watts: The Story of College Radio is a feature-length documentary film currently in production, exploring the legacy of college radio. This is the untold story of college radio brought to life by the students behind the mic and the bands they made famous. It's the story of the youth and music culture that originated, and later flourished, on the airwaves of American colleges and universities, establishing a new generational voice and a new path to success for many alumni and artists. Full of music, humor and energy, 35000 WATTS: THE STORY OF COLLEGE RADIO is an electrifying journey through an aspect of American culture that is often overlooked but has made an undeniably loud impact on society.
title: 35000 Watts: The Story of College Radio
